name: The Elevator (Wizardelf)
description:
**WARNING** This experience may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised

A short little experience I made for a school gamejam. The prompt was Rise and Fall, and I took an elevator as candidate for that. In the game you take an elevator to a short array of rooms, each of which having different lighting, music and contents. 

I know this is very short, I used this opportunity to refresh my memory on making stuff. With it done, I can now start working on my own major project. 

Music, assets and gameplay by me. Mikee.
